main.name: Chand Shaikh
main.description: currently employed by Wideeye Technology pvt. ltd. Your Own Mortgage where I work as a frontend developer across the range of our products.
main.bio: 1+ years of experience as a UI/Front-End Developer with Startups (Mostly early stage with the team size of max 3 person in technology) and build up to 3+ products ( Web-based applications) in very tight timelines using multiple technologies.Involved in Design, Development and Product department time by time as per organization requirement to handle project End to End (understand the requirement, requirement gathering, propose solutions, build the software, testing and debugging, etc).The technologies which, I've used in my tenure are React.js, React Native, HTML5, CSS3,  JavaScript, JSON, Github, etc.I'm a self-motivated, quick learner, good team player, planning and development, relationship management, operations and good in time and logistics coordination and scheduling.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over.

education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.
Here I took my diploma of Information Technology.And Here I discovered programming and start learning from basic
Here I took my Nano-degree Program. And Here I discovered programming and start learning from basic
